dmca.title: Spanish Company Complains of Defamation
dmca.body:
Subject: To remove the infringing pages from Google
[redacted]

We request the suppression of the specified URL because we have found some offending pages with our Google search results about our company. We have found it on Google's search "revelance sa":

The Google website where the information above appears: Google.es

Identify our country of residence and citizenship: Espana

Identify precisely the information that you claim violates your rights under applicable law (the "Unlawful Material"). Some information contained in the forums:

From:
[redacted]

[Screenshots]
The reason that we believe the information indicated above violates our rights or is illegal under applicable law. "The search result URL identified above contains defamatory information about my company that is not permitted under the laws of the country in which I reside or I am a citizen"

5. Information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact us 
[redacted]

6. Information sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the webpage that allegedly contains the Unlawful Material (webmaster or domain registrant name and email address).
[redacted]

Include the following statement: "I have a good faith belief that the information specified above is not permitted by applicable law."

Include the following statement: "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate."

9. Sign
